headline: Why McKesson (MCK) is a Top Value Stock for the Long-Term
summary: The Zacks Style Scores offers investors a way to easily find top-rated stocks based on their investing style. Here's why you should take advantage.

raw.headline: Why McKesson (MCK) is a Top Value Stock for the Long-Term

headline: Is It Worth Investing in McKesson (MCK) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), McKesson (MCK) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?
